com.compendium
Class ProjectCompendium

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ProjectCompendium

public class ProjectCompendium
extends java.lang.Object

ProjectCompendium is the main class for running the Project Compendium application. It initialises the main JFrame and creates a new log file instance.

Author:
Michelle Bachler
